entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Reenable CanRunDsicoveryTool test after rc2 runtime codeflow from templating #36587
  • Make Desktop WPF use Core WPF targets and tasks (MarkupCompile) #36585
  • Ensure that RestoreActionConfig is flowed through workload installation #36583

Closed

  • .NET local tool install not working with .NET 8 RC2 SDK #36539
  • Make ImplicitUsings does not work out of the box with .NET Framework project #24909
    9.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #36584
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Switch back to the RC2 build since GA has gone internal. #36578
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Silence workload install logging on `dotnet --info` and related commands. #36443
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • update .idea/ since it's a folder #36364
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Create project templates target to 9.0 #34996
    untriaged, Area-Common templates
  • Bump Verify.DiffPlex from 2.2.1 to 2.3.0 in /eng/dependabot #36547
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: main

Updated

  • upgrade stage 0 and unwind a few steps that were done for the 9.0 upg… #36437
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2305494 #36497
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • Workload history #34946
    untriaged, Area-Workloads, 8.0.2xx
  • Skip workload integrity check on Linux and non-sudo #36123
    untriaged, Area-Workloads, DO NOT MERGE
  • Update manpages for 8.0 #36447
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, 8.0.1
  • Add dotnet package search #36289
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
